ddf.catalog.plugin

Interface PolicyResponse

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolicyResponseImpl

    public interface PolicyResponse
    Response from PolicyPlugin containing policy information for Operation and individual items, such as Metacard or Result

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Set<String>> itemPolicy()
      Policy to be applied to item being worked on by the catalog.
      Map<String,Set<String>> operationPolicy()
      Policy to be applied to the catalog operation being attempted.

    • Method Detail

      • operationPolicy

        Map<String,Set<String>> operationPolicy()
        Policy to be applied to the catalog operation being attempted. The PolicyResponse object contains 1 or more policy objects of the type: Map>. Where the key is some attribute that you wish to assert against a Subject and Set would be the values associated with that key.
        Returns:
        Map containing policy information pertaining to this operation.

      • itemPolicy

        Map<String,Set<String>> itemPolicy()
        Policy to be applied to item being worked on by the catalog. The PolicyResponse object contains 1 or more policy objects of the type: Map>. Where the key is some attribute that you wish to assert against a Subject and Set would be the values associated with that key.
        Returns:
        Map containing policy information pertaining to this item.
